channel.title: Foods on Kai Del Regno
channel.description: Recent content in Foods on Kai Del Regno

item.title: Joe's Falafel
item.description: Joe’s Falafel is my number one

item.title: Sri Siam Cafe
item.description: 12843 Vanowen St. North Hollywood, CA 91605 Sri Siam Cafe is the best Thai restaurant in the Valley. Everything is solid but some top choices are: Crispy Rice Salad Deep-fried grains of rice mixed with Thai sour sausage, dressed with lime and chilis and served with romaine lettuce. Similar to larb, this dish originates from Laos (In Lao restaurants it will be called Nam Khao), but it is much less commonplace in Thai restaurants than larb - I don’t know of any other Thai restaurant that serves it.

item.title: Tacos El Venado
item.description: 11702 Victory Blvd North Hollywood, CA, 91606 The home territory taco stand and undisputed GOAT of tacos al pastor. Top recs: Tacos Al Pastor Obviously. Comes with pineapple. My top taco rotation Suadero, tripas, cabeza, and al pastor. I think in this rotation the key is to follow the tripas with cabeza and let the unctiousness cut that intensity. Alambre Desmadre Esentially fajitas with cheese. Desmadre - all the meats. Comes with tortillas.
